backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing daily orders, karigar assignments, and user profiles with mixed authorization rules and CRUD-style query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the app root and including the SheetJS XLSX library via CDN.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component rendering the Daily Orders page with a header and footer, without authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting unauthenticated users to submit their name and save a user profile.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory, using a mutation hook.
Exports selected factory orders as HTML, showing a loading state during generation.
Groups orders by karigar within a factory and renders each group with an OrdersTable.
Sidebar listing factories with order counts and allowing selection of a factory.
Displays mapping summary stats and unmatched designs, allowing applying mappings with an overwrite option.
Table displaying order details with selection checkboxes and karigar assignment badges.
Search and sort controls for filtering and ordering the orders list.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main daily orders workflow handling uploads, filtering, factory grouping, assignments, mapping, and swipe navigation.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses CSV or Excel files into ParsedOrder objects, detecting file type and validating required columns.
Parses design-to-karigar mappings from Excel sheets named 1, 2, and 3, aggregating them into a mapping object.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sort state for filtering orders by text and design using memoized results.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates grouped factory order HTML by karigar and triggers download, formatting data and escaping HTML.
Builds and downloads an HTML report for a single karigar’s orders with basic table styling and escaping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls for profiles, orders, and assignments using React Query with automatic invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with shared styling tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty declaration file reserved for jsPDF typings.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Declares global XLSX types for reading spreadsheets and converting sheets to JSON.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and feature definitions for an order‑management Excel‑upload app.
